Topic.Title: Remove header info for each room

Posts.HTML:
Hi guys,

I'm starting a new project, and I was wondering if I could take out the 'you can go..' 'you can see...' header info that gets generated for each room that I enter. For example, this is from a test project

[Description prefix] a froom.
[Objects list prefix] a mcguffin.
[GoListHeader] east, north, northeast or in.
This room is an example room. Here is some formatting.


I'd love to change it so that the description prefix, object list prefix, and go list header (not sure when see list header shows up, but if it does show up, then that too) are not shown/generated when I enter a room. Ideal version:

This room is an example room. Here is some formatting


Let me know if this is possible! I've checked out the template list but it seems like what I'm looking for isn't there.

Posts.EditableText: I just figured this out, it was in the game settings under 'Room Descriptions'. Sorry for making a post about this!
